title: So you need to access Wikipedia’s Shroud of Turin page today
post:
Why would Wikipedia have a dog in this fight?
Unless … Wikipedia had been recently begging for money but suddenly stopped. And one thing the entertainment industry has is plenty of money. Could it be that …?!
author: Stephen E. Jones

title: So you need to access Wikipedia’s Shroud of Turin page today
post: Wow, looks like there’s updates there nearly every day. I am highly distrustful of Wikipedia since it’s so prone to manipulation but it does at least provide a primer on a subject.
author: Chris
